environment.logic.constructs.enemies

Class Arganok

  • java.lang.Object
    • environment.logic.constructs.Construct
      • environment.logic.constructs.enemies.Arganok
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Enemy

    public class Arganok
extends Construct
implements Enemy
    An Enemy that chases the Player when the player enters a circle area around the Arganok. This enemy uses the a predetermined sprite that can be found in the working directory as Arganok.png. This is also a concrete subclass of Construct.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Construct, Enemy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Arganok(Point inital, int trackingRadius)
      Constructs an new Arganok Enemy that is also a concrete subclass of Construct.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getMove()
      Moves the enemy to its next location.
      void setX(int x)
      Sets the int x coordinate of the Arganok while also moving the region in which the Arganok hovers.

      • Methods inherited from class environment.logic.constructs.Construct

        equals, getSprite, getX, getY, move, setY

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Arganok

        public Arganok(Point inital,
               int trackingRadius)
        Constructs an new Arganok Enemy that is also a concrete subclass of Construct.
        Parameters:
        inital - Point that denotes the initial position on the screen of the Arganok
        trackingRadius - int that denotes the radius around the Arganok that the Arganok will peruse the player.
        See Also:
        Sprite, Point, Construct, Direction, setHoverBounds()
